title: Phase 2 Progress - SyncCoordinator Complete
content: Phase 2 progress update with SyncCoordinator complete (19 new tests). Used Context7 MCP for WebExtensions API docs, Perplexity MCP for testing patterns validation. Key insights: test message ordering/isolation, tab lifecycle handling, storage consistency, coordinator election. API alignment critical - VisibilityHandler uses options object, handlers expect specific property names (soloedOnTabs not soloTabId). Total: 1846 tests passing. Next: VisibilityHandler (15-20 tests), UpdateHandler (15-20 tests), then StateManager, PanelManager, Integration scenarios. Estimated 15-20 hours for full completion. All patterns established and infrastructure proven.
